mapper.select: /* commonMapper.getCommonDeviceInfo */ SELECT V_DETAIL_CD AS detailCd, V_CD_NM AS cdNm, V_CD_ENG_NM AS cdEngNm, V_CD_HAN_NM AS cdHanNm FROM NST_DEVICE_INFO AS DEVICE LEFT JOIN NST_CD_DETAIL AS CD ON DEVICE.V_GR_ID = CD.V_DETAIL_CD WHERE V_MASTER_CD = 'SM400' GROUP BY V_GR_ID

/* commonMapper.getMessageStatusCodeNew */ SELECT V_DETAIL_CD AS detailCd , V_CD_NM AS cdNm , V_CD_HAN_NM AS cdHanNm , V_CD_ENG_NM AS cdEngNm FROM NST_CD_DETAIL WHERE V_MASTER_CD = 'SM024' AND V_CD_NM = #{cdNm}
/* commonMapper.getEventLevel */ SELECT V_DETAIL_CD AS detailCd , V_CD_NM AS cdNm , V_CD_ENG_NM AS cdEngNm , V_CD_HAN_NM AS cdHanNm FROM NST_CD_DETAIL WHERE V_MASTER_CD = 'SM010'
/* commonMapper.getEventStatus */ SELECT V_DETAIL_CD AS detailCd , V_CD_NM AS cdNm , V_CD_ENG_NM AS cdEngNm , V_CD_HAN_NM AS cdHanNm FROM NST_CD_DETAIL WHERE V_MASTER_CD = 'SM049'
/* CommonMapper.getThsLocInfo */ SELECT V_DETAIL_CD AS detailCd , V_CD_NM AS cdNm , V_CD_ENG_NM AS cdEngNm , V_CD_HAN_NM AS cdHanNm FROM NST_CD_DETAIL WHERE V_MASTER_CD = 'SM019'
/* CommonMapper.getSiteId */ SELECT V_SITE_ID FROM NST_PMS_SETTING WHERE V_CATEGORY = "sysOPMode"

/* CommonMapper.getPmsUserSmsInfo */ SELECT TRIM(LEADING ',' FROM GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT email)) AS email , TRIM(LEADING ',' FROM GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT telegramId)) AS telegramId , TRIM(LEADING ',' FROM GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT mobileNo)) AS mobileNo FROM ( SELECT IF(V_EMAIL_REC_YN = 'Y', V_EMAIL, NULL) AS email , IF(V_TELEGRAM_REC_YN = 'Y', V_TELEGRAM_ID, NULL) telegramId , IF(V_SMS_REC_YN = 'Y', V_MOBILE_NO, NULL) mobileNo FROM NST_USER_INFO WHERE V_EVENT_REC_YN = 'Y' AND ( V_EMAIL_REC_YN = 'Y' OR V_TELEGRAM_REC_YN = 'Y' OR V_SMS_REC_YN = 'Y') ) AS A

/* CommonMapper.getPmsUserSmsInfo */ SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(V_COLUMN ORDER BY N_KEY_ORD) AS division FROM ( SELECT N_KEY_ORD , CASE WHEN V_KEY = 'useAlarmSMS' THEN 'LG_V1.0' WHEN V_KEY = 'useAlarmTelegram' THEN 'Telegram_V1.0' WHEN V_KEY = 'useAlarmEmail' THEN 'Gmail_V1.0' ELSE '' END AS V_COLUMN FROM NST_SYSTEM_SETTING WHERE V_KEY IN ('useAlarmSMS', 'useAlarmEmail', 'useAlarmTelegram') AND V_VALUE = 'Y' ORDER BY N_KEY_ORD ) AS DIVISION
